item.title: 🍽 HUB1 - Sprout Lunch Menu
item.description: 🍽 HUB1 - Sprout Lunch Menu: | Vores daglige, friske og næringsrige måltidssalat med frit valg mellem vegetabilsk eller animalsk protein. | Our daily fresh and nutritious meal salad with a free choice of either plant-based or animal protein. |

item.title: 🍽 HUB3 - Lunch Menu
item.description: 🍽 HUB3 - Lunch Menu: | Lamb Biryani | Slow-braised lamb seasoned with warm Indian spices, served with brown rice, sweet mango chutney, and soft naan bread. | Vegetarian: Paneer Biryani – the same aromatic spice blend with fried pieces of Indian cheese, brown rice, mango chutney, and naan bread. |

item.title: 🍽 HUB2 - Lunch Menu
item.description: 🍽 HUB2 - Lunch Menu: | We’re kicking off the week with classic meatballs in curry sauce – served with brown rice, sweet and tangy apple pieces, and crispy kale for a fresh twist. | VEGETARIAN: A hearty vegetarian curry packed with delicious vegetables and chickpeas – served with brown rice, sweet and tangy apple pieces, and crispy kale for that same fresh twist.

item.title: 🍽 HUB1 – Kays - Lunch Menu
item.description: 🍽 HUB1 – Kays - Lunch Menu: | Pink roasted veal cuvette with roasted potatoes, bearnaise cream and crispy summer vegetables | Vegetarian: roasted tempeh with roasted potatoes, bearnaise cream and crispy summer vegetables |
